nodes.text: Mynock Cloud City was a spicy dish made from mynocks, a species of silicon-based bat-like parasites that was edible by carbon-based lifeforms when properly seasoned. It was popular with members of the Twi'lek species.

Mynock Cloud City was first mentioned in the 2008 Star Wars Legends reference book The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia. It was confirmed to be canon after it was mentioned in Star Wars: Absolutely Everything You Need to Know, a canon reference book released in 2015.
